@graph.name: Really Quick Broccoli Pasta
@graph.description: Recipe video above. This is a great emergency meal OR carb + veg side for all those times when your cupboards are bare except for broccoli, pasta, and some kind of cheese. It's saucy without using tons of oil, and there's loads of sub options. Quick and utterly scrumptious - loaded with tons of broccoli!
recipeIngredient: 350g / 12 oz   dried short pasta ((I used small shells))
1/2 tsp+ red pepper flakes ((add more if you want spicy!))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta: Boil a large pot of water with 2 tsp salt, add pasta.

itemListElement.text: Cook broccoli: Add broccoli into water 1 - 2 minutes before pasta is cooked.
